title: Why Did I Get 7,000 Phone Calls in 24 Hours?
description: In this video, Max Fosh shares his experience of receiving 7,000 phone calls in just 24 hours and explores the reasons behind it.
summary: Max Fosh receives an overwhelming number of phone calls in a short period of time and investigates the cause.
payoff: The payoff comes as Max unravels the mystery behind the sudden influx of phone calls and reveals the unexpected reason for it, leading to a humorous and surprising conclusion.
